name: VxStream Sandbox
description: This App integrates VxStream Sandbox Service and provides actions like 'detonate_file', 'run_query', 'get_result' etc. Every action uses the 'api_key'.

base_url.description: Base URL to VxStream Sandbox Application Server

actions.description: Search for samples in VxStream Sandbox database using search terms.
Search for similar samples by given Sha256 hash in the Falcon Sandbox database.
Search for a given IP in the Falcon Sandbox database.
Search for a file by one kind of hash(Sha1, Md5, Sha256) in the Falcon Sandbox database.
Search for a file by one kind of data(Sha1, Md5, Sha256 or Filename) in the Falcon Sandbox database.
Search for a given malware family in the Falcon Sandbox database.
Search for a given domain in the Falcon Sandbox database.
Search for a given URL in the Falcon Sandbox database.
Download the pcap file of sample from Falcon Sandbox and add it to vault.
Download sample result data from Falcon Sandbox and add it to vault.

id.description: Sample Id in one of format: 'jobId' or 'sha256:environmentId'

actions.description: Fetch results of an already completed analysis in the Falcon Sandbox.

id.description: Sample Id in one of format: 'jobId' or 'sha256:environmentId'

actions.description: Check status of sample (file or URL) submitted in the Falcon Sandbox.

id.description: Sample Id in one of format: 'jobId' or 'sha256:environmentId'

actions.description: Detonate a URL in the Falcon Sandbox.
Detonate the file in the Falcon Sandbox.

vault_id.description: Vault ID of file to submit

file_name.verbose: This value will be passed to the Falcon Sandbox as the name of the file that is pickup up from the vault

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity.
